transcripts.text: But I'm saying that we don't have all the facts.  There are some.  there are a lot of fantastical claims made in mainstream media that people have questions about.
And it's just unbelievable.  I'm hearing this from like a leftist.

How consistently the U.S.  media lies, how the New York Times mistranslated workers in their video about China's health care.  I mean, there is consistent deception in U.S.  media when it comes to all things regarding China.  So I have questions about it.  You know, have me arrested.  Have me shot.

OK, I mean, I don't I don't need to have you shot.  This isn't China.  So that's not how we respond to political dissidents.  But yeah, that's I mean, that's insane.  Like this is.  this is like genocide denial.
When you call tankies fascists, everyone knows you're dog whistling to anarchists and antifa to be violent.  You are calling for violence.  You would have had Nelson Mandela beaten up by Antifa.

You would have had Albert Einstein punched in the face.  What?  You equate people that defend socialist countries and question the lies about them in media with Nazis.  That's what you're doing here.  You're doing that to me.
This is like when I argue with fascists and they're like, you want to kill all white people.
You would have been one of the people that spit on civil rights marchers because they were part of the Communist Party.  That's what you're doing.
A tanky organization, William L. Patterson, Henry Winston, great heroic organizers who fought for civil rights.
My criticism of you is that you've engaged in genocide denialism.
You equate them with Nazis.  You want violence against such people.
No, no, no, no, no, no, no, no.  Just you.  No, no, no.  My dude, they're not all as bad as you.  Just you.  You're the one doing the genocide denialism.  Nelson Mandela didn't do that.

Great American poet.  He signed an ad defending the Moscow trials and defending the purges in 1938.  Yeah, that's pretty bad.  Is that the right thing to do?  Maybe not.  That doesn't make him a Nazi.
